Name: Namo Drone Didi & Agricultural Drone Support

Name: Neem Coated Urea
Description/Benefits: Mandatory neem coating of urea; slows nitrogen release, reduces diversion, improves nutrient use efficiency

Name: Paramparagat Krishi Vikas Yojana

Target Beneficiaries: All farmers, especially for water-intensive crops

Name: Pradhan Mantri Fasal Bima Yojana
Description/Benefits: Low farmer premium (2% Kharif, 1.5% Rabi, 5% commercial crops); covers pre-sowing to post-harvest losses due to non-preventable risks

Name: Pradhan Mantri Kisan Maandhan Yojana
Description/Benefits: Minimum assured pension of â¹3,000/month after 60 years; voluntary contributory with government matching contribution
Target Beneficiaries: Small and marginal farmers with limited landholding

Name: Pradhan Mantri Kisan Samman Nidhi
Description/Benefits: â¹6,000 per year per eligible farmer family in three equal instalments via DBT

Name: Pradhan Mantri Kisan Urja Suraksha evam Utthaan Mahabhiyan
Description/Benefits: Up to 60% subsidy for solar pumps (Components: A-grid-connected solar plants, B-standalone solar pumps, C-solarization of grid pumps)

Name: Pradhan Mantri Krishi Sinchayee Yojana

Target Beneficiaries: All farmers, especially in rainfed areas

Name: Rashtriya Krishi Vikas Yojana / PM-RKVY / RKVY-RAFTAAR

Name: Sub-Mission on Agricultural Mechanisation

Name: Sub-Mission on Agro-forestry
